name: Bitcoin Miner: Idle Tycoon
description:
Play to Earn in this fresh update to Bitcoin Miner! Simply tap the green Satoshi's you see on screen and then cash out for real!

Become the ultimate crypto miner by tapping to mine dummy versions of popular crypto currencies in this fun idle clicker. Develop the projects and sell your portfolio for better GPUs (prestige) in this addictive tycoon game! Evolve your coins, collect Airdrops and invest in research to earn as much $$ as possible! PLUS connecting a Zebedee wallet to the game will enable you to earn and withdraw REAL BITCOIN!

Watch an old farm change into a super Bitcoin mining farm! Sell your portfolio and reinvest it to become the next Bitcoin Billionaire!

This is an idler, so your coins are always earning you $$$, even if you're not in the game!

FEATURES:
• Introducing a new type of idle, clicker or tycoon game!
• Start with a pickaxe and turn an old farm into a lucrative crypto mining company!
• Unlock 10 unique cryptocurrencies!
• Visit new worlds and discover their secrets!
• Open daily Airdrops and discover what's inside!
• Constantly earn $$$, even if you are offline!
• No Internet Connection required to play!
• LIVE CHAT directly to the developers in the Fumb Games Discord!

••• Will you become the next Bitcoin Billionaire? •••

Got any problems or suggestions with our game? Tap the Chat button in Settings to speak with us! Or, even better, join our Discord channel here: https://discord.gg/fumbgames

Enjoy!

Fumb Games
.o
